en.SURE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the database record for this server?

en.Thanks1: Thank you for using this bot
en.PING_FAILED: Failed to ping Minecraft server. Please check the server details and try again.
en.NO_MEMBERSHIP: You don't have membership to setup a custom server.
en.FAILED_TO_GENERATE_IMAGE: Failed to generate server status image. Please try again later.
en.SERVER_INFORMATION_RESET: Server information reset. Please set up the server again.

Your Server Successfully Set

en.PROCESSING_ERROR: An error occurred while processing your request.
en.COMMAND_EXECUTION_ERROR: There was an error while executing this command!
en.NO_SERVER_DATA: No server data found. Please start over.
en.SETUP_ERROR: An error occurred while setting up the server.
en.FIELD_NOT_FOUND_ERROR: A required field was not found. Please try the setup again.
en.AT_LEAST_ONE_IP_REQUIRED: At least one server IP (Java or Bedrock) is required!
en.PREVIEW_ERROR: An error occurred while generating the preview.
en.IMAGE_GENERATION_FAILED: Failed to generate server status image. Please try again.

zh.NOT_FOUND: 抱歉！找不到此服务器的数据。

zh.PROCESSING_ERROR: 处理您的请求时发生错误。
zh.NO_SERVER_DATA: 未找到服务器数据。请重新开始。
zh.SAVE_ERROR: 保存服务器信息时出错。
zh.SETUP_ERROR: 设置服务器时发生错误。

zh.BEDROCK_IP_REQUIRED: 基岩服务器 IP 是必需的！
